courseSeedData.title: Introduction to Web Development
courseSeedData.customTopics: HTML fundamentals, CSS styling and layouts, JavaScript programming, React framework, Node.js backend development, RESTful APIs, Database design

courseContent.title: Introduction to Web Development
courseContent.description: A comprehensive course covering modern web development technologies
objectives: Understand HTML5 semantic elements and structure
Master CSS3 styling and responsive design
Learn JavaScript ES6+ features and best practices
Build interactive web applications with React
Create RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express

modules.title: HTML Fundamentals
modules.description: Learn the building blocks of web pages

topics.title: HTML Document Structure
topics.content: Understanding DOCTYPE, head, and body elements...

activities.question: What is the purpose of the DOCTYPE declaration?

topics.title: Semantic HTML Elements
topics.content: Using header, nav, main, section, article, and footer...

topics.title: CSS Selectors and Properties
topics.content: Understanding selectors, specificity, and the cascade...

topics.title: Flexbox and Grid Layouts
topics.content: Creating responsive layouts with modern CSS...

topics.title: Variables and Data Types
topics.content: Understanding let, const, and data types in JavaScript...

activities.question: Which HTML element is used for the main content of a document?

feedback.correct: Correct! The <main> element represents the main content of the document.
feedback.incorrect: Not quite. The <main> element is specifically for the main content area.

activities.question: CSS Grid can only create 2-dimensional layouts.

feedback.correct: Correct! CSS Grid can create both 1D and 2D layouts.
feedback.incorrect: Actually, CSS Grid is very flexible and can create 1D layouts too.
